name: David LUSICK, Petitioner v. Judge Joan SULLIVAN, Respondent

parties: David LUSICK, Petitioner v. Judge Joan SULLIVAN, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of November, 2011, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED. The Prothonotary is directed to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
31 A.3d 654
David LUSICK, Petitioner v. Judge Joan SULLIVAN, Respondent.
No. 69 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 3, 2011.
